content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While discussing as the landlord, Peter Schmidt: It's great to have you here, Yi-Nuo Wang. Regarding the rental price, let's start with our initial expectation of 1300 Euros per month, but I am open to negotiations if you feel it's not suitable for your budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a bit high for me. I was hoping for something around 900 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the significant price difference makes it challenging to find a mutual agreement. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
